changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE USER_ROLES ( user_id integer NOT NULL, role_id integer NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (user_id, role_id), CONSTRAINT fk_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) references USERS (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT fk_role FOREIGN KEY (role_id) references ROLES (id) ON UPDATE CASCADE );
